md:
giải nghĩa từ "enemies" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

### Enemies

* Enemies (noun) - kẻ thù, địch thủ

Meaning: A person or group of people who are opposed to or hostile towards another person or group.

Example sentence: The two countries have been enemies for centuries.

Related words: adversary, foe, opponent, rival

Antonyms: allies, friends, supporters

Note: Enemies can also refer to a person or group of people who are opposed to a particular idea, policy, or system.

### Enemies (verb) - thù địch, đối địch

Meaning: To be hostile or opposed to someone or something.

Example sentence: The two politicians have been enemies for years, constantly attacking each other in the media.

Related words: oppose, resist, fight, combat

Antonyms: support, ally, cooperate, collaborate

Note: The verb "enemies" is less common than the noun form, but it can be used to describe a state of hostility or opposition between two or more parties.
